pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Governor of Texas Greg Abbott | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Greg Abbott, Governor of Texas.

The Prime Minister conveyed his condolences to the Governor for the loss of life and injuries that resulted from the shooting on Sunday in Sutherland Springs, Texas.

The Prime Minister extended his wishes for a full recovery to those who were injured. He offered Canadaâ€™s assistance and said that Canadians stand in solidarity with the United States at this difficult time.
